widget.header: Let’s Find Out What’s Been Achieved So Far by Our Teams at Justia

config.title: Short Videos (Legal Content).
config.description: We have recently produced and uploaded a new short video discussing Patients’ Rights under Mexican Law on our YouTube Channel.

config.title: Justia Mexico Portal Content Updates.
config.description: We have recently updated the content of the Protection Law (Amparo), adding to the growing collection of updated laws on our portal. Additionally, we have refreshed the look and feel of both the Tax Code and the Protection Law to provide a more user-friendly experience.

config.title: Justia Elevate.
config.description: We continue improving Justia Elevate with regular updates and features, including version upgrades for WordPress and the Yoast SEO plugin, support for YouTube shorts, and titles for FAQ stripes, among other improvements.

config.title: QA Automation.
config.description: Our QA Automation Team has recently rolled out several updates, which encompass expanded support for visual regression coverage, QA tests for the Justia Elevate production environment, and an updated ZAP (security verification) tool for on-demand page scanning, among various other enhancements.

config.title: Data Team.
config.description: Our team has recently updated our Justia Lawyer Directory analytics tracking infrastructure and fine-tuned our mailing service event processing. These improvements guarantee a seamless and uninterrupted data flow, enhancing performance and reliability.

config.title: Justia Elevate.
config.description: Justia Elevate remains committed to delivering ongoing updates to our clients. Our latest enhancements include the ability to incorporate external feeds for Justia blogs into Justia Elevate properties, offering a preview of color palettes within the Justia Elevate Designs gallery, and, as always, we've implemented a wide range of additional updates and refinements.

config.title: U.S. Supreme Court Center.
config.description: In anticipation of the U.S. Supreme Court term, we have introduced behind-the-scenes updates to streamline the content revision process for our Editorial Team. Furthermore, our efforts have been dedicated to enhancing performance ensuring swift loading times.

config.title: State Codes:
config.description: We have meticulously processed our State Codes archive to improve crosslinking coverage across various year versions. This enhancement not only benefits our users but also strengthens our SEO efforts.

config.title: Justia Connect:
config.description: We've revamped the design of our Webinars and CLE Centers, enhancing their user-friendliness and visual appeal. Furthermore, we've introduced a new Monthly CLE and Webinar Calendar to help users keep track of upcoming events.
